results.name: a(n) = smallest k such that 2nk-1 and 2nk+1 are primes.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: isA001359 := proc(n) RETURN( isprime(n) and isprime(n+2)) ; end: A124522 := proc(n) local k; k :=1 ; while true do if isA001359(2*n*k-1) then RETURN(k) ; fi ; k := k+1 ; od ; end: for n from 1 to 60 do printf("%d,",A124522(n)) ; od ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 06 2006
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1},While[Nand @@ PrimeQ[{-1, 1} + 2n*k], k++ ];k];Table[f[n], {n, 91}] (* _Ray Chandler_, Nov 16 2006 *)
